htmlBody: Hmmm, this doesn't seem to include the breakdown by funder (Jaan Tallinn and Future of Life Institute) for each grant. I think I can reverse-engineer the amounts per funder by superimposing this and https://futureoflife.org/grant-program/2023-grants/ + https://jaan.online/philanthropy/donations.html but I'm wondering why the breakdown wasn't included in SFF's grant page?

Wow thi isn't my area but the visual is fantastic - what a great way to display grants, other similar orgs should consider something similar. I would say perhaps an order of magnitude even better than a list ;)

Reminds me of global burden of disease...(all my roads lead to public health haha)
